tool_description: This is a RESTful API that returns all the essential data to display accurate vaccination progress for your project.
name: Covid 19 World Vaccination Data
title: Covid 19 World Vaccination Data

api_list.name: home
api_list.description:
Simply pass an iso query parameter with the alpha-3 ISO country code of your choice to receive data for that country

[List of ISO codes](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)

example:  ?iso=USA
